results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = 2^k * (n!/k!)*binomial(n-1,k-1).
comment: Also the Bell transform of A052849(n+1). For the definition of the Bell transform see A264428. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2016

The coefficients of n! * L_n(-2*x,-1), where n! * L_n(-x,-1) are the normalized, unsigned Laguerre polynomials of order -1 of A105278, also known as the Lah polynomials, which are also a shifted version of n! * L_n(-x,1). Cf. p. 8 of the Gross and Matytsin link. - _Tom Copeland_, Sep 30 2016
